data.title: Congressional Record, Volume 154 Issue 175 (Monday, November 17, 2008)
data.text: [Congressional Record Volume 154, Number 175 (Monday, November 17, 2008)] [Senate] [Pages S10602-S10606] From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov] NOMINATIONS Executive nominations received by the Senate: DEPARTMENT OF THE TREASURY NEIL M. BAROFSKY, OF NEW YORK, TO BE SPECIAL INSPECTOR GENERAL FOR THE TROUBLED ASSET RELIEF PROGRAM. (NEW POSITION) DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION ROBERT A.
